divs: sighting detailsmonday night about 11:45pm��� 04\11\2011 skiatook, oklahoma.. i was out walking our dog and looking at the very clear night sky��� we were walking out in an open field away from a lot of light and i was thinking how clear the sky was��� i saw 2 very bright lights moving towards me from the south east. it seemed to be moving slow��� it took about 5 min for the lights to get over head and that was when i could see this object was triangle shaped with 3 lights on the corners with dimmer lights on the leading edge. if i had to guess i would say that the object was moving about 50 to 70 miles an hour with no sound. also i would guess that is was between 500 to 700 feet in the air and if you would hold a playing card out at arm���s length it was about that big looking at the card short side to short side.. i could not see the craft it���s self and could only see the lights. however as it went over head it blocked out the stars. as it moved to the north west��� the lights on the corners did not seem as bright and it only took a few min. for the object to move far enough away that i could not see the lights any more. i could not hear any noise coming from the object at all and it stayed on the same course the whole time i saw it��� the whole time my dog was running around at the end of her long leash exploring clumps of grass and did not seem aware of anything strange going on��� we were about 2 blocks from the highway and the whole time i could still hear the noise of the traffic. i did not have any strange feelings as the craft passed over head and had no lost time or dizzy feelings. to be honest, i did feel a little excited. excited because i have read and listened to a lot of sighting stories, and at last i have had my second sighting, the first one being back in 1976.
